title: Five times dizzy. - Episodes 7-12.
creator_credit: John Eastway, Tom Jeffrey, Australian Children's Television Foundation, Australia. Special Broadcasting Service and Samson Film Services
brief_description: The final three episodes in the dramatisation of Nadia Wheatley’s award winning book about a family of Greek immigrants in Sydney’s Newtown, their homesick grandmother and the inhabitants of the street in which they live, as seen through the eyes of Mareka, the young daughter.
creator_credit_for_label: John Eastway, Tom Jeffrey, Australian Children’s Television Foundation, Australia. Special Broadcasting Service and Samson Film Services
